title: Calories in 5 Strawberries
meta_description: Learn calories in 5 strawberries, plus carbs, fiber, sugars, protein, and full nutrition breakdown per serving for easy tracking.
assumptions: Fresh, medium-sized strawberries (about 12 g each), raw, with hulls removed.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by size, ripeness, variety, and growing conditions. Check labels for packaged berries when available.

quick_answer.text: Five medium strawberries offer about 20 kcal, mainly from natural sugars and fiber.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaged foods.

tweaks.label: Sprinkle 1 tsp sugar on all 5 strawberries
Use large strawberries (18 g each vs. medium)
Add 1 tbsp whipped cream to the serving

faqs.q: How many calories in one strawberry?
faqs.a: About 4 kcal for a medium fresh strawberry.
Yes, 5 strawberries have ~4.5 g carbs, mostly natural sugars with 1 g fiber.

faqs.q: Do strawberries have protein or fat?
faqs.a: Minimalâ€”0.5 g protein and 0.2 g fat total for 5 strawberries.

faqs.q: Calories in frozen strawberries vs. fresh?
faqs.a: Similar at ~20 kcal for 5 medium, but frozen may have slight variations from processing.
Size and added toppings like sugar or cream; fresh ones are naturally low-cal.
